Body:
I wonder how can I use Raspberry Pi to stimulate IoT devices traffics. There isn't a lot of resources on google so I'd post my question here.

Thanks ahead
You probably use it like any other computing device, once you define what your IoT devices traffic" looks like and what protocol(s) it uses."
Do you use [Windows 10 IoT Core](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/iot-core/windows-iot-core)? More detailed information about stimulate IoT devices traffics" is helpful."
